    • getModel

      public static BS_Guest_Model getModel()
      The getModel function is a static function that returns the singleton instance of the BS_Guest_Model class. This allows for only one instance of this model to be created, and it can be accessed from anywhere in the program.

      The singleton instance of the bs_guest_model class

    • passTurn

      public void passTurn(int playerIndex)
      The passTurn function is used to send a message to the host that the player has no more moves to make and wants to move his turn to the next player. pass the turn from one player to another.
      Specified by:
      passTurn in interface BS_Model
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Tell the server which player is passing their turn

    • tryPlaceWord

      public void tryPlaceWord(String word, int x, int y, boolean isVertical)
      The tryPlaceWord function is used to send a message to the host that the player has want to place a word on the board.
      Parameters:
      word - Pass the word that is being placed on the board.
      x - Determine the row coordinate of the word.
      y - Determine the coll-coordinate of the word.
      isVertical - Determine whether the word is placed vertically or horizontally.

    • challengeWord

      public void challengeWord(String indexAndWord)
      The challengeWord function is used to challenge a word that has been played by another player. The function takes in the word that is being challenged as a parameter and sends it to the host.
      Parameters:
      indexAndWord - Send the word to be challenged
